dct_description_sm: Coordinates are approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Kilomètres" (1:60,000,000).
Shows topography, drainage, deserts, islands surrounding continent, political boundaries.
Covers Brazilian coast and northeastern tip of North America.
Profile view comparing elevation of African mountain peaks at lower right.
"Atlas général par J. Perthes No. 17" at top right.
Appear's in Perthes' Atlas général, Gotha, 1869.
